modName: Summon Sindragosa and Dragon Aspects shouts
summary:
This mod will give you shouts to summon the undead frostwyrm Sindragosa and the 5 Dragon Aspects from World of Warcraft. 
As of V4 I will only update the rideable version as it was very time-consuming editing 2 different esp\'s.
descriptionHtml:
CHANGELOG:

V5.1:
-updated Deathwings textures and removed the \"cracks\" effect 
(thx to johnskyrim for the textures)

V5:
-added another new effect to Deathwing which will randomly activate (check the new pic for more)

V4.9:
-added all Dragon Aspects. The books for their shouts are in the same Location as the previous ones

V4.6:
-small update with new fire effect for Deathwing made by me 

V4.5:
-added Deathwing. The books for his shout are in the same Location as Sindragosa\'s
-added a constant fire effect to Deathwing

V4:
-added 3 books to a sack at the throat of the world behind the wordwall, which will teach the 3 words of the shout (you wont need the console anymore to get the shout :))
-changed the words of the shout
-made Sindragosa much stronger
-minor adjustments

V3:
-changed model and textures to the Dracolich from the mod: Deadly Dragons (thx to 3jiou)
(DEADLY DRAGONS IS NOT REQUIRED!, I just added meshes and textures from the mod.)

V2:
-changed the words of the shout to Fus ro dah. Now you\'ll be able to use the shout as soon as you learn Unrelenting Force. (you still have to add the shout through the console)
-changed Sindragosa\'s spelllist to match her WoW appearance.

V1:
-initial release

DESCRIPTION:

This mod will add an ancient sack containing some books, to the throat of the world, which will teach you the shouts to summon the undead frostwyrm Sindragosa and the Dragon Aspects from World of Warcraft. 
I think its pretty lore-friendly as its basically new dragon summon shouts (with less cooldown though). 
The dragons will fight for you similarly to how Durnehviir would (some different attacks and much stronger) and are also rideable. As of V4 I will only update the rideable version which requires both dawnguard AND dragonborn. The older versions will be unchanged so if you want to stick to them thats fine aswell ;)

I downloaded reelo2228\'s awesome Sindragosa mod but she kept standing in my way and flying through the ground and stuff so i made my own version from scratch.
The only thing I used from reelo2228 is his familiareffectsindragosa.
The rest is my own work and what I did was basically take the Durnehviir shout (hence why you\'ll need Dawnguard) and make an exact copy of it.
Then I changed the appearance of the copied Durnehviir to the Dracolich from Deadly Dragons (mod by 3jiou), changed his name, the shout description and added reelo2228\'s effect. 
In the original mod, she used to fly through mountains and stick really close to the player. She does\'nt do that anymore.
THESE DO NOT REPLACE ANY OTHER INGAME DRAGON!!! YOU WILL STILL HAVE DURNEHVIIR, ODAHVIING etc. 
This mod ADDS  NEW dragon summons!

REQUIREMENTS:

-latest Skyrim patch
-Dawnguard DLC
-Dragonborn DLC

HOW TO INSTALL:

NMM:
 just activate it :P

Manual: 
copy the Data folder to your Skyrim directory (usually C:/Program Files/Skyrim , may differ for different users)

HOW TO OBTAIN THE SHOUTS:

Through Books: (also check the location image)
Go to the Throat of the world(highest mountain in Skyrim) and look for an ancient sack behind the word wall there. Inside you will find some books which will teach you the words needed for the shouts. After that you only need to unlock them with dragonsouls.
You have to shout at a nearby ground and there has to be enough space. They won\'t appear if you shout at the sky ( just like durnehviir)

HOW TO RIDE THEM:

Hold the shout button until summoned.
Then use the same shout on your dragon again but without holding the button.(just a quick press)

HOW TO UNINSTALL:

NMM: 
deactivate the mod :P

Manual:
1. delete Sindragosa.esp from Skyrim/Data/
2. delete the deathwing,sindragosa,Alexstrasza,Ysera,Nozdormu and Kalecgos folders inside Skyrim/data/meshes/actors and Skyrim/data/textures/actors
3. delete the bookread.pex inside Skyrim/data/scripts

COMPATIBILITY:

Should be compatible with any mod except reelo2228\'s original mod.

BUGS:

-The first 3 times that one of the dragons is summoned it will teach you the soul rend shout if you dont know it already. FIX: not known to me. I tried removing the script that triggers this but it messed up the dragons behaviour so I reinserted it.
-Nothing big but sometimes the dragons will resist your riding shout.  FIX: shout again until it works :P
(Dont really know why they sometimes resist and sometimes they dont^^)

RECOMMENDED MODS:

-Cinematic Fire Effects 2 HD by Ichibu (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2692/?)
makes Deathwing and fire in general look a hell of a lot better
-Bigger and Badder LICH KING Collectors Edition by LuciferX10 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25696/?)
is the perfect mod to go with Sindragosa 

CREDITS:

-to Bethesda for making such an awesome game 
-to Blizzard for the idea 
-to 3jiou for allowing me to use his Dracolich model (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3829//?)
-to johnskyrim for allowing me to use his Deathwing texture (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4086//?)
-to esey for the Nozdormu texture (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12492/?tab=1&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D12492%26preview%3D&pUp=1)
-to xRevan117x for the Alexstrasza,Ysera and Kalecgos textures (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1372/?tab=1&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D1372%26preview%3D&pUp=1)
-to reelo2228 for the familiareffectsindragosa (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9151//?)
-to me for the rest 
IF YOU WANT TO USE/IMPROVE THIS MOD, JUST GIVE ME AND THE OTHER PEOPLE ON THIS LIST CREDITS PLEASE :) 

hope you enjoy this mod!
author: kurasa25
